00086 // Construction/Destruction
00088 
00092 void RPCOutCall::onBrokerShutdown()
00093 {
00094         TRACE("Lost connection to broker");
00095 
00096         onEvent(BrokerDisconnectEvent);
00097 }
00098 
00103 void RPCOutCall::onOtherModuleInstanceShutdown(Integer otherModuleId)
00104 {
00105         TRACE("Module " << moduleId << " notified that module " << otherModuleId
00106                   << " is shutting down");
00107 
00108         if (moduleId == otherModuleId)
00109                 onEvent(ModuleDisconnectEvent);
00110 }
00111 
00118 void RPCOutCall::processReply(DataBlockReader r, bool isException)
00119 {
00120         reader = r ;
00121         onEvent(isException ? NormalExceptionEvent : NormalReplyEvent);
00122 }
00123 
00130 DataBlockReader RPCOutCall::waitForReply(Integer mId)
00131 {
00132         moduleId = mId ;
00133 
00134         event.wait();
00135 
00136         TRACE("Processing event type " << eventType);
00137 
00138         switch (eventType)
00139         {
00140                 case BrokerDisconnectEvent :
00141                         throw new SBWCommunicationException("broker disconnected");
00142 
00143                 case ModuleDisconnectEvent :
00144                         throw new SBWCommunicationException("implementation module disconnected");
00145 
00146                 case NormalExceptionEvent :
00147                         {
00148                                 unsigned char type;
00149                                 
00150                                 reader.getWithoutType(type);
00151 
00152                                 std::string message, detailedMessage ;
00153 
00154                                 reader >> message >> detailedMessage ;
00155 
00156                                 switch (type)
00157                                 {
00158                                         case ApplicationExceptionCode :
00159                         throw new SBWApplicationException(message, detailedMessage);
00160 
00161                     case RawExceptionCode :
00162                         throw new SBWRawException(message, detailedMessage);
00163 
00164                     case CommunicationExceptionCode :
00165                         throw new SBWCommunicationException(message, detailedMessage);
00166 
00167                     case ModuleStartExceptionCode :
00168                         throw new SBWModuleStartException(message, detailedMessage);
00169 
00170                     case IncompatibleMethodSignatureExceptionCode :
00171                         throw new SBWIncompatibleMethodSignatureException(message, detailedMessage);
00172 
00173                     case TypeMismatchExceptionCode :
00174                         throw new SBWTypeMismatchException(message, detailedMessage);
00175 
00176                     case ModuleIdSyntaxExceptionCode :
00177                         throw new SBWModuleIdSyntaxException(message, detailedMessage);
00178 
00179                     case IncorrectCategorySyntaxExceptionCode :
00180                         throw new SBWIncorrectCategorySyntaxException(message, detailedMessage);
00181 
00182                     case ServiceNotFoundExceptionCode :
00183                         throw new SBWServiceNotFoundException(message, detailedMessage);
00184 
00185                     case MethodTypeNotBlockTypeExceptionCode :
00186                         throw new SBWMethodTypeNotBlockTypeException(message, detailedMessage);
00187 
00188                     case MethodAmbiguousExceptionCode :
00189                         throw new SBWMethodAmbiguousException(message, detailedMessage);
00190 
00191                     case UnsupportedObjectTypeExceptionCode :
00192                         throw new SBWUnsupportedObjectTypeException(message, detailedMessage);
00193 
00194                     case MethodNotFoundExceptionCode :
00195                         throw new SBWMethodNotFoundException(message, detailedMessage);
00196 
00197                                         case SignatureSyntaxExceptionCode :
00198                                                 throw new SBWSignatureSyntaxException(message, detailedMessage);
00199 
00200                     case ModuleDefinitionExceptionCode :
00201                         throw new SBWModuleDefinitionException(message, detailedMessage);
00202 
00203                     case ModuleNotFoundExceptionCode :
00204                         throw new SBWModuleNotFoundException(message, detailedMessage);
00205 
00206                     case BrokerStartExceptionCode :
00207                         throw new SBWBrokerStartException(message, detailedMessage);
00208 
00209                     default :
00210                         throw new SBWRawException(
00211                                                         "Encountered unknown Exception code", "in RPCOutCall::waitForReply in C/C++ library");
00212                 }
00213                         }
00214                 case NormalReplyEvent :                         
00215                         return reader ;
00216 
00217                 default :
00218                         throw new SBWCommunicationException("strange event in RPCOutCall");
00219         }
00220 }
00221 
00226 void RPCOutCall::onEvent(EventType e)
00227 {
00228         eventType = e ;
00229         event.notify();
00230 }
